tag_list: project-management, capacity-building, marketing-and-publicity-writing, translation, editing, photography
overview: Steve Bowden has 11 years of Publishing Sales experience having sold for a great variety of publishing clients, including Simon & Schuster, Running Press, Dover and Scribner. He has also worked as a publishing consultant, on various matters such as sales support, sales strategies and catalog copy. As a freelance writer, Steve has worked for both print and online magazines. He holds two degrees, a B.A. (English) and an M.A. (Adolescence Education)
